issue.title: [GLib][CI] MinGW failure in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6502](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6502). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This failure seems to have crept in to master

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/wesm/arrow/build/job/ocfkn9m0a3ux1ur5#L2288

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6502?focusedCommentId=16926247) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Oh,  it may be related to gobject-introspection gem 3.3.8 I released today.
